description:
Cabernet is Pokémon Sommelière and a Pokémon Trainer. She managed to pass the Pokémon Sommelièr Association`s test to become a C-Class Pokémon Sommelière. Upon passing the test she decided to challenge Cilan at the Sanyo Gym for the Tri Badge. Cilan defeated her but when Cabernet returned to challenge Cilan at the gym, Chili and Cress had to explain that Cilan was on a journey and was no longer at the gym. Angry that Cilan was not the gym leader when she visited, she battled at the gym anyhow and won the Tri Badge.
Ash met her at a new Friendly Shop while on his way to Hiun City. Cabernet did a compatibility test for all of Ash`s Pokémon but she gave him low compatibility for all his Pokémon. Ash and his Pokémon were not impressed with her compatibility test skills. Cilan and Iris interrupted the compatibility test only for Cabernet to realize that she had finally found Cilan and she was now out for revenge.
Cabernet challenged Cilan to a revenge battle where she ended up loosing to him yet again. More angry than ever, she vowed to defeat Cilan the next time they met while becoming an S-class Sommelière and she took off.
name: Cabernet
